page.title: 09TRADE
page.content:
THE VILLAGE SHOP
There is a village shop in Okeford Fitzpaine. It has a Post Office in it. We asked the owners a few questions about it. They told us that they have about 100 customers each day, mainly local people although they do get a few passing customers as well. Some of the customers do their weekly shopping there, but most go there for odds and ends, and do their weekly shopping at one of the large supermarkets in town. The Post Office is used a lot by local people and helps to keep the customers.
There are two garages in Okeford, a public house ,"The Royal Oak",and an electrical shop.
